Hero.subtitle: The next generation darts tournament platform. Tournament search, club creation, real-time results, and full customization.

Features.title: Why tDarts?
Features.description: The most modern darts tournament platform with all the features you can imagine. Simple, fast, professional.

search.title: Tournament Search
search.description: Easily find tournaments by location, level, and time. Filter results and apply with one click.

draw.title: Tournament Announcement
draw.description: Create your own tournaments with custom rules and formats. Automatic group assignment and pairing.

club.title: Club Management
club.description: Found or join darts clubs, organize community events. Full membership management.

stats.title: Statistical Tracking
stats.description: Detailed statistics for every player: averages, 180s, highest checkouts, form graphs.

realtime.title: Real-time Tracking
realtime.description: Follow matches and results live. Automatic updates and notifications.

custom.title: Full Customization
custom.description: All tournament formats supported: 501, 301, Cricket, and custom rules. Customizable boards.

qr.title: QR Code Connection
qr.description: Players can join with QR code and password, without registration. Quick and simple.

tablet.title: Tablet Support
tablet.description: Supports tablets placed at the boards. Optimized scoring interface and touch control.

secure.title: Password Protected
secure.description: Every tournament is protected with its own password. Secure access and data protection.

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.description: Find out how the system works and create your first tournament in minutes.

Pricing.description: Pricing suitable for clubs and tournament organizers of all sizes
